title: The Domino Tattoo
description: Estwych is a place only the initiated can enter, a place to face one's deepest fears and most secret desires. It is a place where those without the domino tattoo find that they are everyone's slave and nobody's lover. Into this world apart comes Josephine Morrow, a young woman beset with a strange restlessness. At Estwych, she finds a cruelty and a gentleness she has never knownâ€”a cruelty that will test her body to its limits and a gentleness that will set her heart free in an experience that will change her. This experience is granted only to those with the domino tattoo.
author: Cyrian Amberlake
